group_1.narration: The day after tomorrow,@the middle school and high school sections will hold@a joint school festival at Mizuna Girls' Academy!
If we can just get through the last two days of preparations,@there's plenty of sweet food waiting for us!@This event is the best...!!!
Maybe because we have a home economics course?
There's so much variation in the dishes,@and they all taste soooo delicious...

group_1.textRight: I believe the chairperson of the committee is@looking a bit fed up...? Also, you're drooling...

group_1.textLeft: I was just thinking about the school festival andâ€”

group_1.textRight: Listen, I know you're looking forward to it, but@can we just focus on the story right now?

group_1.narration: I can't, I can't...@Right now, I'm in a meeting of@the school festival's organizing committee...
There's also Asuka-senpai, who ran for the committee,@and Yukika-senpai, who joined the committee as@a liaison to the student council.
My Magical Girl senpais are with me, and@I need to be strong for the sake of@the delicious school festival.

group_1.textRight: I'll go over the threatening letter and@yesterday's accident once again.
It was delivered after the accident...

group_1.narration: This is a warning...@Call off the school festival...@If you don't cancel the festival...@A series of troubles will follow, and@the consequences will be terrible.

group_1.textRight: Aaaaahhh?!@The materials for the outdoor stage...!

group_1.textCenter: Wha...whaaaat?!@The materials for the stage collapsed?!

group_1.textLeft: Yesterday's incident?!@Then it wasn't just an accident...

group_1.textRight: Fortunately, no one was seriously injured and@the materials are still intact, but...

group_1.textCenter: The faculty are investigating, suspecting a@connection to the threatening letter.
They've contacted the police as well.
And if, as the threatening letter says, trouble@continues and damage is done...

group_1.textLeft: Ehhh?! The school festival will be@canceled?!

group_1.textRight: You fiendish blackmailer...@I will never forgive you...!!
A school cannot afford to expose its students@to danger...
Everyone, be quiet!@Nothing has been officially decided.

group_1.textLeft: ...But if trouble continues and somebody@is harmed, it'll be canceled, right?

group_1.textRight: ...Yes, it's frustrating, but I can understand@where the teachers are coming from...

group_1.textLeft: Well then...we just need to stop trouble!
We don't have to cancel the school festival to@prevent trouble from happening.
We have so many committee members here.
Let's all work together to prevent trouble@and save the school festival!

group_1.textRight: Giving in to the blackmailer's demand and@canceling the school festival is unforgivable!

group_1.textCenter: ...Well, it's true that this is no time to@show weakness.

group_1.narration: "Let's have the organizing committee patrol@during the preparation period, and@ensure the students follow the rules."

"In particular...@Every year, some students request nighttime access@because they're unable to finish in time,@but this year, there will be no extensions!@Let's ask the teachers to keep an eye out when@they lock the doors to see if there are any students@left after hours!"

group_1.textLeft: I'd like a way for everyone to share information@with us so that we can get to incidents quickly.

group_1.narration: "Perhaps we can create a dedicated posting area@on the school's website? I believe it would be@easier to keep up with everything if the@committee is notified whenever a post is made."

group_1.textLeft: Alright! Let's do our best to have lots of@delicious foodâ€”
Let's do our best to hold the school festival@safely!

group_1.textCenter: I'll...start by patrolling the middle school@section!
